entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.6°C

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
